headline: Balfour Beatty reaches agreement on the sale of Omnicom to Hitachi Rail
summary: Balfour Beatty, the international infrastructure group, today announces it has reached agreement for the sale of Omnicom, its specialist rail measurement hardware and intelligent software business, to...
